content: I'm a Software Engineer and Certified ScrumMaster® based in Boston, MA, with over 14 years of experience in tech. My background spans everything from front-end development to backend systems, with a strong focus on user experience and design.
Right now, I work at Presence, where I help shape the interface that delivers telehealth therapy services to children.

I have both a BS and MS from Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute, and over the years I've built up a toolbox of skills across languages, frameworks, and platforms. Whether I'm writing code or collaborating across teams, I aim to keep things user-centered, efficient, and just a little bit creative.

Outside of work, I'm usually off adventuring with my husband and our mischievous Pomeranian, Leopold. We love to travel, and when I'm home you'll probably find me tending to my plant collection, bingeing a podcast, or diving into a new hobby (most recently: crocheting and homebrewing).
I'm not currently taking on freelance work, but feel free to reach out if you want to connect or chat about a project.

skills.blurb: Here's a snapshot of the tools and tech I've worked with — and I'm always up for learning something new.

projects.blurb: Here are a few things I've built just for fun.

content.title: Carolina Hurricanes Bingo
content.description: Play bingo while you watch hockey
